Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Lush with understated elegance, this small private chapel is awash in hues of burnished gold and umbral ochre, a gilt crucifix standing atop an altar against the eastern wall the primary feature of the space. A dual hassock in rich ochre crushed velvet stands before the altar, dozens of candles illuminating the space from the tiered candelabras that surround the centerpiece on all three sides. Behind the crucifix, a gold-accented fresco of the resurrection of Christ covers the wall, dark umber drapes flanking the arrangement in gold silk trimmed velvet that matches the upholstery found on the hassock.

Lush with understated elegance, this small private chapel is awash in hues of burnished gold and umbral ochre, a gilt crucifix standing atop an altar against the eastern wall the primary feature of the space. A dual hassock in rich ochre crushed velvet stands before the altar, dozens of candles illuminating the space from the tiered candelabras that surround the centerpiece on all three sides. Behind the crucifix, a gold-accented fresco of the resurrection of Christ covers the wall, dark umber drapes flanking the arrangement in gold silk trimmed velvet that matches the upholstery found on the hassock.

Lush with understated elegance, this small private chapel is awash in hues of burnished gold and umbral ochre, a gilt crucifix standing atop an altar against the eastern wall the primary feature of the space. A dual hassock in rich ochre crushed velvet stands before the altar, dozens of candles illuminating the space from the tiered candelabras that surround the centerpiece on all three sides. Behind the crucifix, a gold-accented fresco of the resurrection of Christ covers the wall, dark umber drapes flanking the arrangement in gold silk trimmed velvet that matches the upholstery found on the hassock.
an arched double door leading northwest

Each side of the arched double door leading to the northwest is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
an arched double door leading south

Each side of the arched double door leading to the south is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
